name: Mahnoor 💖
greetingText: I love your name, my heart skips a beat every time I hear it ❤️💘
wishText: May your heart always be full of love and happiness 💕🌹💖
text1: I’m thinking of you right now! 😍💭
textInChatBox: I’m sending you all my love today ❤️💌
text2: I was planning to tell you something... 😏💫
text3: But I stopped for a moment... 🕒💭
text4: I realised I wanted to say something 💬
outroText: Okay, now come back and let me know if you felt my love 💌💖
replayText: Or click, if you want to see my love again 💕💖
